name: HanuCoin
description: HanuCoin (HNCI) is a community-driven BEP-20 token built on BNB Smart Chain, focused on transparency, on-chain verification, and long-term ecosystem growth.
tagline: A transparent, community-driven BEP-20 token on BNB Smart Chain.

about.description: HanuCoin (HNCI) is a decentralized digital asset designed to support a transparent and community-focused Web3 ecosystem. The project emphasizes fair token distribution, locked liquidity, and verifiable on-chain data without any centralized control.

author: HanuCoin Team
